uploadPage.headline: Upload datasets securely with built-in ownership protection.
uploadPage.subHeadline: Share your data with 0G's decentralized storage and zero-knowledge privacy

datasetInfo.title: Dataset Information
datasetInfo.description: Provide accurate details about your dataset to maximize credibility and discovery.

zeroG.title: Powered by 0G Network
zeroG.description: Your data is stored on 0G's decentralized infrastructure with optional zero-knowledge privacy protection, ensuring ownership and security.

metadata.title: Metadata Matters
metadata.description: Rich metadata increases your dataset's discoverability and builds credibility with potential buyers. Include detailed descriptions, proper categorization, and relevant tags.

fields.title: Dataset Title
fields.titlePlaceholder: Enter a descriptive title for your dataset
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your dataset's contents, collection methodology, and potential use cases

monetizePage.headline: Set rent or one-time sale prices to monetize your datasets.
monetizePage.subHeadline: Choose your monetization strategy and maximize your data's earning potential

pricingStrategy.title: Pricing Strategy
pricingStrategy.description: Choose how you want to monetize your dataset

suggestedPricing.title: AI-Powered Price Suggestions
suggestedPricing.description: Our algorithm analyzes similar datasets to suggest optimal pricing

earningsPreview.title: Potential Earnings Preview
earningsPreview.description: See projected earnings and market exposure before publishing

options.customDesc: Set your own price based on unique value

buildPage.headline: Assemble AI models with intuitive modular blocks.
buildPage.subHeadline: Drag, drop, and connect building blocks to create powerful AI pipelines

pipeline.title: AI Pipeline Builder
pipeline.description: Visual interface for assembling modular AI components

blocks.title: Available Building Blocks
blocks.description: Pre-configured modules for common AI tasks

preview.title: Pipeline Preview
preview.description: Real-time visualization of your AI architecture

trainPage.headline: Train your AI models with datasets and test performance.
trainPage.subHeadline: Link datasets to models and run training experiments with performance monitoring

datasetSelection.title: Dataset Selection
datasetSelection.description: Choose datasets for training your AI model

performance.title: Performance Monitoring
performance.description: Real-time training metrics and validation results

tokenizePage.headline: Turn your AI model into an investable asset via tokenization.
tokenizePage.subHeadline: Create tradeable tokens backed by your AI model's performance and usage

modelSelection.title: Select AI Model
modelSelection.description: Choose a trained model to tokenize

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics Configuration
tokenomics.description: Define pricing and revenue sharing parameters

marketplace.title: Marketplace Listing
marketplace.description: List your tokenized model for trading and usage

fields.queryPriceDesc: Price charged for each API call to your model
fields.revenueShareDesc: Percentage of profits shared with token holders
fields.tokenSupplyDesc: Total number of tokens to mint
fields.stakingRewardsDesc: Rewards for token holders who stake

dashboard.headline: My Dashboard
